Reviews.Title: Digital Cameras
Reviews.Author: Dick G. Deditus "Screen Gems"
Reviews.Content: Found the camera a nice replica but much too difficult to use and the built in storage system renders the camera virtually useless for any serious picture taking.  Can't recommend this little number for anything other than having a minox digital in the collection.  Certainly far below any other Leica standard.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Stephen Harris
Reviews.Content: One star is too much.  This was one of two I ordered - one to replace the other.  The electroniccontrols did not work.  I tried three different batteries (one from the package, two new ones from the store) and the camera responded the same.  The LCD readout would not display correct information.  It was garbled.

Reviews.Title: Plastic Scam
Reviews.Author: Nik Willmore
Reviews.Content: Not only is this thing all plastic with FIXED levers that are merely decorative, if you look at the product image carefully you'll see a HUGE black plastic black box on the back of it which even kills the cuteness factor of it. My 35mm Minox at least fit in my pocket, when the lens was folded shut.

Reviews.Title: camera from adorarama
Reviews.Author: Ms. Ruth Fried
Reviews.Content: The item (camera) from Adorarama with no other parts and no manual.  Seller did say I could return it, which I have done.

Reviews.Title: Portable and cute replica
Reviews.Author: Eileen Mcsorley
Reviews.Content: I am revising my review as I have actually gotten quite attached to the little gadget and it is easy to stick in a handbag and has a battery that has not yet needed replacing.

ProductInfo.Features:
4.0-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 11 x 15-inch prints
Miniaturized Leica M3 classic camera body with digital interior
LCD with image counter, mode-selection (no image display)
Optical viewfinder (Galileian style); automatic shutter-speed adjustment from 1/4 1/1000 second
Powered by one CR2 battery, USB cable; stores images on 32MB internal memory
ProductInfo.Name: Minox Digital Classic Leica M3 4MP Digital Camera with Minoctar 9.6mm Digital Lens
